import React from "react" import Die from "./components/Die" /** * Challenge: * * Create state to hold our array of numbers. (Initialize * the state by calling our `allNewDice` function so it * loads all new dice as soon as the app loads) * * Map over the state numbers array to generate our array * of Die elements and render those in place of our * manually-written 10 Die elements. */ export default function App() { const [dice, setDice] = React.useState(allNewDice()) function allNewDice() { const newDice = [] for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) { newDice.push(Math.ceil(Math.random() * 6)) } return newDice } return (
item)}/> item)}/> item)}/> item)}/> item)}/> item)}/> item)}/>
) }
